sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of American Express topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 5.4%.
Year to date, American Express registers a 1.0% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Procter & Gamble, trading down 3.8%.
Procter & Gamble is lower by about 18.9% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Intel, trading down 2.3%, and General Electric, trading up 2.1% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
